text: Hillary Clinton Debated Trump.  Here's Her Advice for Kamala Harris.  —  The 2016 Democratic nominee fell short to Donald Trump, but she had strong debate moments against him.  In an interview, she offered some thoughts for Kamala Harris.  —  Hillary Clinton has as much experience as any Democrat in debating Donald J. Trump.
